title: SAR Image Classification
description: Developed a CNN-based SAR image classification model using TensorFlow and speckle filters like Lee and Gamma MAP.

title: Power Outage Prediction
description: Built an end-to-end ML pipeline for predicting outages using Random Forest and GridSearchCV.

title: MarketScope: Intelligent Stock Forecasting App
description: Built a stock price simulator with Streamlit and Yahoo Finance using Brownian motion and log-normal distribution.

title: Dino Map (UCSD DataHacks)
description: Created a CNN to map dinosaur images to country locations with interactive visualization.

title: Advanced Image Processing
description: Implemented grayscale, blur, rotate, and KNN-based image classification using Python and NumPy.

title: Song Recommender
description: Built a tool to suggest similar songs using audio features and search phrases across artist discographies.

title: Library Management System
description: Created a Python-Tkinter app connected to MySQL to track book lending for a school.
